channel.title: Checkoff Chat
channel.itunes:author: Chuck Zimmerman
channel.description: Weekly interviews with the Missouri Beef Industry Council
channel.itunes:subtitle: The official podcast of the Missouri Beef Industry Council
channel.itunes:summary: Each week a representative of the MBIC is interviewed on a current project or issue that the organization is involved in.

item.title: Checkoff-Chat-5-9-12
item.itunes:author: Chuck Zimmerman
item.itunes:subtitle: May Beef Month in Missouri
item.itunes:summary: It’s May and as thoughts turn to steaks on the grill it is Beef Month in Missouri and Kaity Holtman says the Missouri Beef Industry Council has lots planned for both producers and consumers of beef.
item.itunes:keywords: agriculture, agribusiness, farming, podcast, marketing, advertising, beef
